neighbors.name: Cecil W. Watkins Jr.
neighbors.claims: Cecil W. Watkins Jr. is listed as the owner of a rural Lee County parcel (PIN 024-00-00-047-000) [Lee County GIS](https://www.leecountysc.org/directory/departments___elected_officials/mapping_office.php). The Watkins family has significant local influence; a Ben E. Watkins served on the Lee County Council in the 1990s [Justia](https://law.justia.com/cases/south-carolina/supreme-court/1993/23903-2.html), and Alan Watkins currently serves as the Lee County Administrator [Lee County Council Minutes](https://cms9files.revize.com/leecountysc//cc%20min.071123.pdf). Cecil W. Watkins Sr. was a long-time resident and community leader (Jaycee President) prior to his passing [Norton Funeral Home](https://www.nortonfh.net/obituaries/cecil-watkins-sr).
neighbors.influence_justification: Family includes County Administrator and former Councilman

approach_recommendations.engage: Leverage family political ties; approach via County Administrator's office or mutual contacts to discuss land legacy and community benefit.

neighbors.verification_notes: Confirmed family prominence via County Administrator Alan Watkins and former Councilman Ben E. Watkins. Specific stance of Cecil Jr. remains unknown.

neighbors.name: Guy C. Smith et al.
neighbors.claims: Guy C. Smith (with other co-owners) is associated with a Lee County property (PIN 025-00-00-021-000) [Lee County GIS](https://www.leecountysc.org/directory/departments___elected_officials/mapping_office.php). A 'Guy C. Smith Construction Co.' has operated in the region (Augusta/Aiken area), suggesting potential corporate or heirs' ownership rather than a primary residence [Augusta GA Gov](https://forms.augustaga.gov/WebLink/0/doc/18351/Page2.aspx). No indications of public positioning on local development issues were found.
neighbors.influence_justification: Likely absentee or corporate owner; no local roles

approach_recommendations.engage: Treat as corporate/absentee owner. Contact via registered agent or mail. Focus on financial stability and low-maintenance land use.

neighbors.name: James Edward Tolbert
neighbors.claims: James Edward Tolbert is listed as the owner of a parcel in Lee County (PIN 024-00-00-133-000) [Lee County GIS](https://www.leecountysc.org/directory/departments___elected_officials/mapping_office.php). A James Edward Tolbert (1957-2024) recently passed away in neighboring Georgia, raising the possibility that this is now heirs' property [Legacy](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/name/james-tolbert-obituary?id=55144598). No public statements or documented views on development by a living James Tolbert in Lee County were found.
neighbors.influence_justification: No public roles; possible absentee or heirs property

approach_recommendations.engage: Verify current ownership status (possible estate). Approach heirs with sensitivity, focusing on property value retention and minimal disturbance.
